body.p: Breckinridge County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Dorcas Lyons. Father of William Lyons, Rosanna Lyons, Crawford Lyons, John Lyons, Louisa Jane Lyons, Elizabeth Lyons, Peter Lyons, Margaret Lyons, and Dorcas Lyons. Farmer in Breckinridge County in 1850 and 1860. Owned three enslaved persons in 1850 and seven in 1860.
